effects.name: Fainted
effects.description:
When a creature's HP reaches and remains at 0, it is afflicted with Fainted.

A Fainted creature cannot use Actions, does not benefit from Abilities, and is cured of all @Trait[major-affliction], @Trait[minor-affliction], @Trait[pseudo-affliction], and @Trait[stage-change] effects they possess.

Fainted is cured when the afflicted creature's HP is greater than 0.

The creature's @Affliction[weary] count increases by 1 whenever they are cured of Fainted.

effects.name: Burn
effects.description: The afflicted creature loses a Tick of HP at the end of each of their Activations. The creature has their default ATK stages are reduced by 1 while Burn is active.

effects.name: Poison
effects.description: The afflicted creature loses a Tick of HP at the end of each of their Activations. The afflicted creatures default SPATK stages are reduced by 1 while Poison is active.

effects.name: Blight
effects.description: At the end of the afflicted creatures Activation, it loses X Stacks of Blight, where X is 2<sup style='font-size: x-small;'># of Activations passed with Blight</sup> and takes a Tick of HP per Stack lost. The afflicted creatures default SPATK stages are reduced by 1 while Blight is active. When a creature receives Blight, it loses the Poison Condition, with Blight gaining 33% of its remaining Poison Stacks as extra Stacks on Blight. When afflicted with Poisoned X while Blighted, the creature gains +1 to its Blight Stacks.

effects.name: Paralysis
effects.description: The afflicted creature's SPD is reduced by 50%. The creature also has Slowed while Paralysis is active.

effects.name: Drowsy
effects.description: The Power of all of the afflicted creature's attacks is reduced by 33%, and the creature cannot utilize the [Priority X] or [Interrupt X] capabilities of their Actions. The afflicted creature's default SPDEF stages are reduced by 1 while Drowsy is active.

effects.name: Nightmares
effects.description: This affliction can only be applied to Drowsy creatures. The Power of all of the afflicted creature's attacks is reduced by 50%, and the creature cannot utilize the [Priority X] or [Interrupt X] capabilities of their actions. The creature loses a Tick of HP at the end of each of its Activations and has their default SPDEF and ACC stages reduced by 1 while Nightmares is active. When a creature receives Nightmares, it loses the Drowsy Condition, and gains 33% of its remaining Drowsy Stacks onto Nightmares, and further Nightmares Stacks cannot be applied.

effects.name: Frozen
effects.description: The afflicted creature is unable to use actions (either during its Activations or as interrupts/reactions), but takes 33% less damage from all sources. The afflicted creature's default DEF stages are reduced by 1, and has its Base SPD increased by 50%. Additional Frozen Stacks cannot be added while Frozen is on a creature.

effects.name: Splinter
effects.description: The afflicted creature loses a Tick of HP when they are damaged by a Physical- or Special-Category attack. The creature has Stunted while Splinter is active.

effects.name: Slowed
effects.description: The afflicted creatures Movement Scores are reduced by 50%, rounding down (minimum 1).

effects.name: Blinded
effects.description: The afflicted creature is unable to see, ocularly. The creature has their "seeing-based" vision options disabled (standard vision, Darkvision, X-Ray Vision, etc.) and can only perceive using their other senses (as listed in their Traits). If they do not have a way to see, or have someone guiding them, they are unable to target other creatures with Attacks or Actions.

effects.name: Hindered
effects.description: The afflicted creatures Skill DCs are reduced by -10.

effects.name: Stunted
effects.description: When the afflicted creature recovers HP, that amount is reduced by 2 Ticks (if the amount after this reduction becomes negative, the afflicted creature instead just doesnt recover HP at all).

effects.name: Confused
effects.description: At the end of the afflicted creature's Activations, it has a 50% chance of using Fumble.

effects.name: Flinched
effects.description: The creature's Activation is Delayed by their Flinched Stack Value (max 5) x 20%. A creature loses all Stacks of Flinched after its next Activation.

effects.name: Weary
effects.description: While a creature is Weary, its default ACC and EVA stages are based on its Weary value, X. Specifically, the default ACC and EVA stages are set to the negative sum of all X and all integers between 0 and X (Weary 1 sets the defaults to -1, 2 to -3, and 3 to -6). Weary is automatically increased by 1 when a creature Faints. When a creature has 4 or more Weary, it is unable to battle until they reduce their Weary. Weary cannot wear off on its own - a creature must deliberately Rest or consume Items such as Apples to remove Stacks of Weary.

effects.name: Stuck
effects.description: While afflicted with Stuck, creatures may not leave the combat area. If the afflicted creature is an owned Pokemon, it cannot willingly switch out (or be switched out by another party). When a creature with the [Trainer] or [Ace] trait would gain the Stuck affliction; they instead gain Slowed X, rather than Stuck X.

effects.name: Bound
effects.description: The afflicted creature cannot willingly use any <Movement>. Stacks of Bound do not decrease at the end of a creature's Activation, instead the effect that applied Bound will provide a way of removing the Bound Condition.

effects.name: Disabled
effects.description: One of the afflicted creatures attacks cannot be used, under any circumstances. The move in question is determined by the source of the disabled effect, usually being the last attack the target used. If this would prevent them from using any attack, they may Struggle instead.

effects.name: Nullified
effects.description: One of the afflicted creatures abilities is negated, and cannot be activated or benefited from. The ability in question is determined by the source of the nullification, usually determined randomly.

effects.name: Suppressed
effects.description: The afflicted creature spends 50% more PP on all actions that use PP.

effects.name: Lifted
effects.description: the afflicted creature is held aloft, unable to act normally. The creature cannot use <Movement> other than [Teleport] while Lifted and is otherwise considered Stuck and Raised for the duration. A Lifted creature also suffers -6 EVA stages.

effects.name: Raised
effects.description: While a creature is Raised, it is immune to attacks and effects with the [Earthbound] trait.

effects.name: Harden
effects.description: While under the effect of Harden, the afflicted creatures [Contact] attacks have +20 Power, and their [Dash] attacks gain [Crit 1] or have their [Crit X] increase by +1.

effects.name: Sharpen
effects.description: While under the effect of Sharpen, the afflicted creatures [Contact] attacks gain [Sharp], and their [Sharp] attacks gain [Crit 1] or have their [Crit X] increase by +1.

effects.name: Destined
effects.description: when the afflicted creature deals damage with a Damaging Attack to the source of Destined, the afflicted creature is inflicted with the same amount of damage.

effects.name: Disguised
effects.description: The user is not easily recognized by sight. Any creature that attempts to see through Disguised must make a contested Psychology or Spot skill check against the Disguised creatures Disguise skill, and upon success ignores any effects that require Disguised to be active.

effects.name: Braced
effects.description: while a creature is Braced, its default DEF and SPDEF stages are increased by +2 and its default ATK and SPATK stages are decreased by 1. Additionally, a Braced creature is immune to critical damage. A creature loses the Brace Affliction after it moves or makes an attack of its own accord.

effects.name: Duel
effects.description: While a creature is afflicted with Duel, the creature and the source of the Affliction have [Crit 2] on attacks they use against one another, and take and deal 67% less damage from/to creatures other than themselves. Creatures afflicted with Duel and the source of the Duel are also Stuck. If either the source or afflicted creature Faint or are otherwise removed from battle, the Duel Affliction is removed.

effects.name: Engulfed
effects.description: While a creature is afflicted with Engulfed, it is also considered to be Bound and Stuck. While Engulfed the afflicted creature cannot be targeted by Attacks, and it can only target the creature that has Engulfed it with Attacks, although these Attacks are resisted by two stages.

effects.name: Curled
effects.description: while Curled, a creature cannot use Held Items and has +1 default DEF stage. Additionally, moves with the [Curl] Trait have their Power doubled while their user is Curled.

effects.name: Chanted
effects.description: If an attack were to deal critical damage to a creature with Chanted, the attack instead deals damage as if it were not a Critical Hit.

effects.name: Grounded
effects.description: While Grounded, creatures become unable to use their [Flight] movement, nor can they be Lifted or Raised and have those effects removed.

effects.name: Cursed
effects.description: While Cursed, an afflicted creature loses three ticks of HP at the end of each of their Activations.

effects.name: Shrink
effects.description: The afflicted creatures Size Category is reduced by one.

effects.name: Enlarge
effects.description: The afflicted creatures Size Category is increased by one.

effects.name: Marked
effects.description: While Marked, all creatures unallied to the afflicted creature and within 8m of it can only target the Marked creature with their attacks. Whenever the creature with Marked is hit by an Attack, reduce the Stack Value of its Marked by 1.

effects.name: Unlucky
effects.description: While Unlucky, a creature cannot utilize its Luck.

effects.name: Perish
effects.description: When a creatures Perish count hits 0, the creature's HP is set to 0. Humans and Ace creatures gain Weary 1 instead of losing HP when their Perish count is 0. The Perish affliction is removed if a creature is switched out or leaves combat.

effects.name: Invisible
effects.description: The afflicted creature vanishes from sight, and cannot be detected by sight based vision or targeted by Attacks. In addition, the creature has +4 default EVA stages. Invisible ends when the creature uses an Attack, is hit by an Attack, by using a Free Action to end Invisible, or by the end conditions of the effect that granted Invisible. Any creature can perform an Intense Spot Check to ignore the effects of Invisible.

effects.name: Transient
effects.description: The afflicted creature, while still visible, is able to traverse through any material, as if it wasnt even there. It may use any of its Movements to move through the air or any substance (as if it were always on or in the appropriate substance), ignoring any and all blocking terrain. The creature also possesses +6 default EVA stages. Creatures that make attacks or actions while Transient deal 75% less damage. The creature loses 5 PP per activation while Transient, and gains a Stack of Weary if it is out of PP while Transient.

effects.name: Fear
effects.description: The afflicted creature does 33% less damage to the source of the Fear affliction, and suffers -1 default ACC stage on attacks against them. Fear applied from different sources have their own Stacks.

effects.name: Stockpile
effects.description: While a creature has Stockpile, the default stages for DEF and SPDEF are increased by +1 for each Stack of Stockpile it possesses. Stockpile can have up to 3 Stacks.

effects.name: Leech
effects.description: The afflicted creature loses two Ticks of HP at the end of each of their Activations and the Source that applied Leech gains HP equal to the amount the afflicted creature lost.

effects.name: Rebound
effects.description: Damage inflicted on the afflicted creature by Physical or Special-Category attacks deals  of the inflicted damage on the attacking creature.

effects.name: Ringed
effects.description: when a creature with Ringed concludes an Activation, they heal a Tick of HP, with additional effects from appropriate weathers/terrains as described by the effect that granted Ringed.

effects.name: Enraged
effects.description: A creature may only use Physical- or Special-Category moves while it is Enraged.

effects.name: Charmed
effects.description: The afflicted creature believes the source of Infatuation is a dear friend or romantic interest. Afflicted creatures have a 50% chance of being unable to target the source of their infatuation with an attack, and have -2 stages of EVA against attacks from the source of their infatuation.

effects.name: Taunted
effects.description: The afflicted creature does 33% less damage to creatures other than the source of the Taunted affliction. The afflicted creature cannot use Status-category attacks for the duration of Taunted.

effects.name: Grapple
effects.description:
The afflicted creature possesses -1 default ACC and EVA and may only take Actions with the [Grapple] trait. Creatures that are not in control of a Grapple are also Bound. A creature in control of the Grapple can take a Free Action on their turn to end their participation in Grapple. The creature in control of the Grapple is treated as having the non-in-control creature(s) as being Mounted on itself.
If an afflicted creature is the only participant of a Grapple, they lose this affliction.

effects.name: Resolved
effects.description: An afflicted creature creature gains +1 default DEF and SPDEF stages.

effects.name: Boosted
effects.description: An afflicted creature gains +1 default ATK and SPATK stages.

effects.name: Rapid
effects.description: While afflicted with Rapid, the creature may perform Complex Actions as Simple Actions OR [Exhaust] Actions are performed as though they lack the Trait OR [Set Up] Actions set up and resolve on the same activation. The creature has its Initiative delayed by 60% after its Activation and loses -1 EVA stage for 2 Activations.

effects.name: Strong
effects.description: While afflicted with Strong, the Power of the creature's Attacks are increased by +20% and has its Initiative delayed by 20% after its Activation.

effects.name: Agile
effects.description: While afflicted with Agile, Power of the creature's Attacks are decreased by -20% and has its Initiative advanced by 20% after its Activation.

effects.name: Precise
effects.description: While afflicted with Precise, the creature has +1 default ACC and has its Initiative delayed by 20% after its Activation.

effects.name: Evasive
effects.description: While afflicted with Evasive, the creature has +1 default ACC and the Power of its Attacks are decreased by -20%.
